channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS

item.title: Report E-2024060429
item.description:
Report E-2024060429

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-21T15:17:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-20
  • City: BATESVILLE
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG Energy, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6540
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Energy, LLC driver was delivering diesel fuel into the customer's storage tank. It appears that the storage tank over-pressurized which allowed approximately 10 gallons of diesel fuel to be released. Hepaco Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
